item.title: 667/704 Adding Dialogues to NPC's
item.dc:creator: @ipwnu2day ipwnu2day
item.description:
@ipwnu2day wrote:

[center][size=24pt]PART 1: SPAWNING AN NPC[/size][/center]

[center]In order to start a dialogue you will first need to spawn a character![/center]
[center]So lets add an npc called “Spirit”[/center]

[center]Open up NPCSpawning.java[/center]

[center]Now under:

Add this:

The 13482 is the NPC ID that we are going to use. Now replace the following X_COORD and Y_COORD with your custom npc spawn coordinates. All you are doing is spawning an npc at that position and telling it not to move because of the false statement. If you want it to move then simply replace false with true.

[center]NOW SAVE AND COMPILE TO MAKE SURE THERE IS NO ERROR![/center]
[center][b]IF THERE IS NO ERROR THEN RUN YOUR SERVER TO SEE IF THE SPIRIT NPC IS THERE![b][/center]
[center][b]IF THE NPC IS THERE THEN GO TO PART 2![b][center]

[center][size=24pt]PART 2: ADDING THE DIALOUGE[/size][/center]

[center]Now the dialogue is the most difficult part. I too had troubles with it until I realized what I was doing wrong. Mostly bracket errors, but I found an easier way. I will explain it later. [/center]

[center]Create a new java file and save it as Spirit.java[/center]

[center]Now inside Spirit.java add this:[/center]
[center][code=java]package com.rs.game.player.dialogues;

import com.rs.Settings;
import com.rs.cache.loaders.NPCDefinitions;

public class Spirit extends Dialogue {

int npcId;

@Override
public void start() { //This is the start up when you click the npc it will talk to you first
	npcId = (Integer) parameters[0];
	sendEntityDialogue(SEND_1_TEXT_CHAT,
			new String[] { NPCDefinitions.getNPCDefinitions(npcId).name,
					"What the fuck are you looking at?" }, IS_NPC, npcId, 13482); //To change what the npc is saying just erase whats inside the qoute and add your own
}

@Override
public void run(int interfaceId, int componentId) {
	if (stage == -1) { //This is the starting stage
		stage = 0; //This is telling it to go to stage 0 for when you click an option it will automatically know what to do
		sendDialogue(SEND_4_OPTIONS, "What would you like to say?", //This is the title for your options
				"Watch your language!", //This is option 1
				"I'm looking at you because your ugly!", //This is option 2
				"Do you give a fuck who I am looking at?", //This is option 3
                                    "Umm..."); //This is option 4
	} else if (stage == 0) {
		if (componentId == 1) { //This is the command for option 1
			stage = 8; //This is telling it to go to stage 8
			sendEntityDialogue(SEND_1_TEXT_CHAT, //This is sending 1 Text Line for your player to say
					new String[] { player.getDisplayName(), //This grabs your name and puts it at the top of the chat representing you talking to the npc
							"Watch your language!" }, IS_PLAYER, //This is what your saying to the npc
					player.getIndex(), 9827); //The 9827 is basically suppose to be the face number or whatever... Ex *Question Face* or *Angry Face* ect...
					
		} else if (componentId == 2) {  //This is the command for option 2
			stage = 9;  //This is telling it to go to stage 9
			sendEntityDialogue(SEND_1_TEXT_CHAT, //This is sending 1 Text Line for your player to say
					new String[] { player.getDisplayName(), //This grabs your name and puts it at the top of the chat representing you talking to the npc
							"Im looking at you because your ugly!" }, IS_PLAYER, //This is what your saying to the npc
					player.getIndex(), 9827); //The 9827 is basically suppose to be the face number or whatever... Ex *Question Face* or *Angry Face* ect...
					
		} else if (componentId == 3) { //This is the command for option 3
			stage = 10; //This is telling it to go to stage 10
			sendEntityDialogue(SEND_1_TEXT_CHAT, //This is sending 1 Text Line for your player to say
					new String[] { player.getDisplayName(), //This grabs your name and puts it at the top of the chat representing you talking to the npc
							"Do you give a fuck who I am looking at?" }, IS_PLAYER, //This is what your saying to the npc
					player.getIndex(), 9827); //The 9827 is basically suppose to be the face number or whatever... Ex *Question Face* or *Angry Face* ect...
					
		} else if (componentId == 4) { //This is the command for option 4
			stage = 1; //This is telling it to go to stage 1
			sendEntityDialogue(SEND_1_TEXT_CHAT, //This is sending 1 Text Line for your player to say
					new String[] { player.getDisplayName(),  //This grabs your name and puts it at the top of the chat representing you talking to the npc
							"Umm..." }, IS_PLAYER, //This is what your saying to the npc
					player.getIndex(), 9827); //The 9827 is basically suppose to be the face number or whatever... Ex *Question Face* or *Angry Face* ect...
		} else
			end(); //This is telling it to end if there is no command selected
	} else if (stage == 1) { //This is stage 1
		stage = 2; //This is telling it to go to stage 2 after the npc is done talking
		sendEntityDialogue(SEND_2_TEXT_CHAT, //This is sending 2 Text Lines for the NPC to talk to you
				new String[] {
						NPCDefinitions.getNPCDefinitions(npcId).name,
						"Umm what?", //This is the npc is saying you you in Text Line 1
						"Stop wasting my fucking time and answer my question!" }, IS_NPC, npcId, 13482); //This is the npc saying to you in Text Line 2 | Replace the 13482 with whatever you want the face expression to be
	} else if (stage == 2) { //This is stage 2
		stage = 3; //This is telling it to go to stage 3 for when you click an option it will automatically know what to do
		sendDialogue(SEND_4_OPTIONS, "What would you like to say?", //This is the title for options
				"What question was that again?", //This is option 1
				"Why are you here?", //This is option 2
				"Why are you a spirit?", //This is option 3
				"I don't want to answer your question!"); This is option 4
	} else if (stage == 3) {
		if (componentId == 1) { //This is command for option 1
			stage = 4; //This is telling it to go to stage 4 after you are done talking
			sendEntityDialogue(SEND_1_TEXT_CHAT, //This is telling it to send one text line for you to say
					new String[] { player.getDisplayName(), //This grabs your name and puts it at the top of the chat representing you talking to the npc
							"What question was that again?" }, IS_PLAYER, //This is what you are saying to the npc
					player.getIndex(), 9827); //This is the expression face ID again
		} else if (componentId == 2) { //This is the command for option 2
			stage = 5;  //This is telling it to go to stage 5 after you are done talking
			sendEntityDialogue(
					SEND_1_TEXT_CHAT, //This is telling it to send one text line for you to say
					new String[] { player.getDisplayName(), //This grabs your name and puts it at the top of the chat representing you talking to the npc
							"Why are you here?" }, //This is what you are saying to the npc
					IS_PLAYER, player.getIndex(), 9827); //This is the expression face ID again
					
		} else if (componentId == 3) { //This is the command for option 3
			stage = 6;  //This is telling it to go to stage 6 after you are done talking
			sendEntityDialogue(
					SEND_1_TEXT_CHAT, //This is telling it to send one text line for you to say
					new String[] { player.getDisplayName(), //This grabs your name and puts it at the top of the chat representing you talking to the npc
							"why are you a spirit?" },  //This is what you are saying to the npc
					IS_PLAYER, player.getIndex(), 9827);  //This is the expression face ID again
					
		} else if (componentId == 4) { //This is command for option 4
			stage = 7;  //This is telling it to go to stage 6 after you are done talking
			sendEntityDialogue(
					SEND_1_TEXT_CHAT, //This is telling it to send one text line for you to say
					new String[] { player.getDisplayName(), //This grabs your name and puts it at the top of the chat representing you talking to the npc
							"I don't want to answer your question!" }, //This is what you are saying to the npc
					IS_PLAYER, player.getIndex(), 9827); //This is the expression face ID again
		} else
			end(); //This is telling it to end if there is no command selected
			
	} else if (stage == 4) { //This is stage 4
		stage = 3; //This is telling it to go to stage 3 after the npc is done talking
		sendEntityDialogue(
				SEND_2_TEXT_CHAT, //This is telling it to send two text lines for the npc to say
				new String[] {
						NPCDefinitions.getNPCDefinitions(npcId).name, //This grabs the npc's name and puts it at the top of the chat representing it talking to the you
						"My question was: umm what?", //This is what the npc is saying to you text line 1
						"Now answer my fucking question!" }, IS_NPC, npcId, 13482); //This is what the npc is saying to you in text line 2 |This is the expression face ID again
						
	} else if (stage == 5) { //This is stage 5
		stage = 3;  //This is telling it to go to stage 3 after the npc is done talking
		sendEntityDialogue(
				SEND_2_TEXT_CHAT, //This grabs the npc's name and puts it at the top of the chat representing it talking to the you
				new String[] {
						NPCDefinitions.getNPCDefinitions(npcId).name, //This grabs the npc's name and puts it at the top of the chat representing it talking to the you
						"Cause I can be here!", //This is what the npc is saying to you in text line 1
						"Now answer my fucking question!" }, IS_NPC, //This is what the npc is saying to you in text line 2
				npcId, 13482); This is the expression face ID again
				
	} else if (stage == 6) { //This is stage 6
			stage = 3; //This is telling it to go to stage 3 after the npc is done talking
		sendEntityDialogue(
				SEND_3_TEXT_CHAT, // Ok you get the fucking point now Im done adding the same line over again I just basically explained everything you need to know
				new String[] {
						NPCDefinitions.getNPCDefinitions(npcId).name,
						"I died thats why!",
						"Are you that fucking retarded?",
						"Answer my damn question!"}, IS_NPC,
				npcId, 13482);
				
	} else if (stage == 7) {
                    end();
		sendEntityDialogue(
				SEND_1_TEXT_CHAT,
				new String[] {
						NPCDefinitions.getNPCDefinitions(npcId).name,
						"Then get the fuck out of here!"}, IS_NPC,
				npcId, 13482);
			
			
	} else if (stage == 8) {
			stage = -1;
		sendEntityDialogue(
				SEND_1_TEXT_CHAT,
				new String[] {
						NPCDefinitions.getNPCDefinitions(npcId).name,
						"Freedom of speech bitch!"}, IS_NPC,
				npcId, 13482);

	} else if (stage == 9) {
			stage = -1;
		sendEntityDialogue(
				SEND_2_TEXT_CHAT,
				new String[] {
						NPCDefinitions.getNPCDefinitions(npcId).name,
						"My grandma's ass has better comebacks then you!",
						"Now tell me what the fuck you are looking at?"}, IS_NPC,
				npcId, 13482);
				
	} else if (stage == 10) {
			stage = -1;
		sendEntityDialogue(
				SEND_2_TEXT_CHAT,
				new String[] {
						NPCDefinitions.getNPCDefinitions(npcId).name,
						"Yes I give a fuck!",
						"Now tell me what the fuck are you looking at?"}, IS_NPC,
				npcId, 13482);
				
			} else
				end();
}

@Override
public void finish() {

}

}[/code][/center]

[center]Ok everything you need to know is in the code, I kinda got lazy towards the end because it was fucking anoying coping and pasting[/center]

[center]Now open up NPCHandler.java and look for:

npc.faceEntity(player); if (!player.getControlerManager().processNPCClick1(npc)) return;

under it add:

if (npc.getId() == 13482) player.getDialogueManager().startDialogue("Spirit", npc.getId());

What this does is telling the server to open Spirit.java on the first click. If there is already and “if” statement below yours then simply add “else” before the if on the one below yours if there isn’t already one.

Now open up DialogueHandler.java and look for:

public static final void init() { try {

under it add:

Class<Dialogue> value43 = (Class<Dialogue>) Class .forName(Spirit.class.getCanonicalName()); handledDialogues.put("Spirit", value43);

Don’t ask me what this is exactly suppose to do because I don’t know, but all I know is that it helps open up Spirit.java. Plus it gives you no error when compiling this.
NOW SAVE AND COMPILE AND TEST OUT YOUR NEW TALKING NPC! [/center]

Read full topic
